common.title: ReefQ - 3D Jewelry Visualization & AR Try-On Platform
common.description: Transform your jewelry business with stunning 3D visualization and AR try-on experiences.

hero.description: Unleash a new vision of digital jewelry with the ReefQ platform. We combine augmented reality technology with high-fidelity 3D visualization to provide a unique jewelry shopping experience for merchants and customers.

features.description: Experience a new way to shop for jewelry with interactive and engaging features

customization.description: Allow customers to personalize materials, gems, and sizes

jewelryViewer.title: Interactive 3D Jewelry Explorer
jewelryViewer.description: Examine jewelry from every angle with our state-of-the-art 3D viewer
jewelryViewer.interactiveDescription: Rotate, zoom and explore every detail of our exquisite pieces in stunning detail
jewelryViewer.benefit1: Photorealistic visualization of materials and gemstones
jewelryViewer.benefit2: Detailed inspection of craftsmanship and design
jewelryViewer.benefit3: Try different variations before making a decision
